Verses: 1 karththaave, Ummai Nambiyirukkiren; Naan Orupodhum Vetkam Adaiyaadhapadi Seyyum.
2 umadhu Needhiyinimiththam Ennai Viduviththu, Ennaik Kaaththarulum; Umadhu Seviyai Enakkuch Saaiththu, Ennai Ratchiyum.
3 naan Eppozhudhum Vandhadaiyaththakkak Kanmalaiyaayirum; Ennai Ratchippadharkuk Kattalaiyitteere; Neere En Kanmalaiyum En Kottaiyumaai Irukkireer.
4 en Dhevane, Dhunmaarkkanudaiya Kaikkum, Niyaayakkedum Kodumaiyumullavanudaiya Kaikkum Ennaith Thappuviyum.
5 karththaraagiya Aandavare, Neere En Nokkamum, En Siruvayadhu Thodangi En Nambikkaiyumaayirukkireer.
6 naan Karppaththil Urpaviththadhumudhal Ummaal Aadharikkappatten; En Thaayin Vayitrilirundhu Ennai Eduththavar Neere; Ummaiye Naan Eppozhudhum Thudhippen.
7 anegarukku Naan Oru Pudhumai Polaanen; Neero Enakkup Balaththa Adaikkalamaayirukkireer.
8 en Vaai Umadhu Thudhiyinaalum, Naaldhorum Umadhu Magaththuvaththinaalum Niraindhiruppadhaaga.
9 mudhirndhavayadhil Ennaith Thallividaamalum, En Belan Odungumpodhu Ennaik Kaividaamalum Irum.
10 en Saththurukkal Enakku Virodhamaaip Pesi, En Aaththumaavukkuk Kaaththirukkiravargal Egamaai Aalosanaipanni:
11 dhevan Avanaik Kaivittaar, Avanaith Thodarndhu Pidiyungal; Avanai Viduvippaar Illai Engiraargal.
12 dhevane, Enakkuth Dhooramaayiraadheyum; En Dhevane, Enakkuch Sagaayampannath Theeviriyum.
13 en Aaththumaavai Virodhikkiravargal Vetki Azhiyavum, Enakkup Pollaapputh Thedugiravargal Nindhaiyaalum Lachchaiyaalum Moodappadavunkadavargal.
14 naano Eppozhudhum Nambikkaikondirundhu, Menmelum Ummaith Thudhippen.
15 en Vaai Naaldhorum Umadhu Needhiyaiyum Umadhu Ratchippaiyum Sollum; Avaigalin Thogaiyai Naan Ariyen.
16 karththaraagiya Aandavarudaiya Vallamaiyai Munnittu Nadappen; Ummudaiya Needhiyaippatriye Menmaipaaraattuven.
17 dhevane, En Siruvayadhumudhal Enakkup Podhiththuvandheer; Idhuvaraikkum Ummudaiya Adhisayangalai Ariviththuvandhen.

18 ippozhudhum Dhevane, Indhach Sandhadhikku Umadhu Vallamaiyaiyum, Varappogira Yaavarukkum Umadhu Baraakkiramaththaiyum Naan Arivikkumalavum, Mudhirvayadhum Naraimayirumullavanaakum Varaikkum Ennaik Kaivideeraaga.
19 dhevane, Ummudaiya Needhi Unnadhamaanadhu, Peridhaanavaigalai Neer Seydheer; Dhevane, Umakku Nigaraanavar Yaar?
20 anega Ikkattugalaiyum Aabaththugalaiyum Kaanumpadi Seydha Ennai Neer Thirumbavum Uyirppiththu, Thirumbavum Ennaip Boomiyin Paadhaalangalilirundhu Erappannuveer.
21 en Menmaiyaip Perugappanni, Ennai Marupadiyum Thetruveer.
22 en Dhevane, Naan Veenaiyaikkondu Ummaiyum Ummudaiya Saththiyaththaiyum Thudhippen; Isravelin Parisuththare, Suramandalaththaikkondu Ummaip Paaduven.
23 naan Paadumpodhu En Udhadugalum, Neer Meettukkonda En Aaththumaavum Gembeeriththu Magizhum.
24 enakkup Pollaappaith Thedugiravargal Vetki Lachchaiyadaindhapadiyaal, Naaldhorum En Naavu Umadhu Needhiyaik Kondaadum.
